sub_title: Sales Manager | Foodservice | Concept development | STACH Food | Hospitality
summary:
💫 What drives me? Reaching results, inspiring people and being part of a high-performing team. A workplace in which transparency is key, where people are being challenged, success is celebrated and change and improvement play an important role, I help organisations to reach their goals. 
I am convinced that engaged employees are a driver for organisational success. Success is not created by one person, but by a team that comes together as one.

🔎 This is me in a nutshell;
- In it to 𝐰𝐢𝐧 it: I am very much result focused and known for my tenacity. 
- A true 𝐩𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞 person: I love building strong relationships with clients and colleagues and get a lot of commitment from the people I work with. 
- One of my favorite values is 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲: I do what I say and say what I do. 
- 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 is key: I believe that this is the basis for great results and successful relationships.

awards.title: Circle of Excellence 2018
awards.description: Hotel Salesperson of the Year - GC&E

awards.title: Young Hotelier Award 2013 - 3rd place
awards.description:
The Young Hotelier Award is an initiative of the Viennese General Managers Council with the goal to promote high potentials in the Austrian hotel market. Participating in the Young Hotelier Award gives a selected amount of participants working in the Austrian hotel market the possibility to gain more insight in the hospitality industry in general, but also providing a unique experience and expansion of knowledge.
The subject I have researched for this project and won the 3rd price with is:
"How can Vienna increase average rate and yet stay competitive with destinations such as Prague, Budapest and Bratislava?

projects.title: Young Hotelier Award 2013
projects.description:
The Young Hotelier Award is an initiative of the Viennese General Managers Council with the goal to promote high potentials in the Austrian hotel market. profile_positions.title: Salesmanager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for developing a commercial strategy and annual business plan to maximize total revenue, profit performance and market share through the development of new and the expansion of existing business, analysis of the hotel market mix and revenue forecasts. 

Maintaining effective working relationships with all key suppliers and internal and external stakeholders to provide maximum benefit to hotel performance. 

Train, coach and continuously develop the Business Development Team (Revenue management, Sales, Reservations, Catering & Events, Marketing and eCommerce) by setting clear objectives, personal development and succession plans. 

*Participation in various regional projects with a focus on increase of sales, customer and employee engagement, revenue performance.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for driving commercial activities in order to maximize rooms and conference and events revenue through pro-active selling and conversion of customer enquiries into confirmed sales (team of 12 FTEs). 

Setting business strategies, coaching and motivating people to drive and grow overall hotel performance. 

* Part of repositioning of the Hotel after full refurbishment in 2018. 
* Circle of Excellence Winner 2018 – EMEA Hotel Sales Person of the year, Groups Conference and Events.
profile_positions.title: Groups, Conference & Events Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Ensuring annual revenue departmental targets are met, with a clear emphasis on leading and driving a team of 20 Conference & Events professionals by keeping them commercially focussed and motivated. 

Responsible for sales conversion and event planning for all meeting and events business at the Hilton Vienna Cluster with over 1,200 bedrooms plus more than 70 function rooms in total.  

* Team Member engagement score of 100% in 2017 (highest one for Continental Europe). 
* Successfully outperformed budget figures in 2015 and 2016.
profile_positions.title: Cluster Director of Convention & Event Sales

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the pricing strategy and revenue management of two out of four Hilton Hotels part of the Austria Cluster (1.376 rooms).
Tasks consisting of monitoring pick-up patterns, lead times and business trends, defining selling strategy, promotion of internal sales and leading weekly business revenue meetings per hotel.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Cluster Revenue Manager, Austria

profile_positions.description: Supporting the Director of Conference and Event Sales in all daily administrative and operative tasks whereby leading a team of 20 professionals. Ensuring maximised revenue, profit and the satisfaction of guests and vendor relations.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Cluster Director of Convention & Event Sales

profile_positions.description: The Elevator Program is an individually tailored development program consisting of two placements of 9 months each in two Hilton Hotels in Europe. Goal is to gain a broad perspective and insight into all departments within a hotel in order to be able to fast track into a career path towards General Manager.
profile_positions.title: Hilton Elevator General Management Trainee - Hilton Vienna Cluster & Hilton London Metropole

profile_positions.description: Responsible for all client contact, office management, project management and the coordination and supervision of all catering staff during big events. From planning the event to the creative aspect, but also the actual execution of the event.
profile_positions.title: Sales Coordinator
